translated: The young men take up their pestles

and the young men find wealth.
having done what you won’t regret.

analyzed: rattiyā purime yāme  pubba jāti manussari
translated: In the first part of the night,🔽I recollected my past lives;
In the middle part of the night,
In the last part of the night,
